title: Will You Spend $70 on The Last of Us Part I? - Kinda Funny Funny Games Daily 07.22.22
description:
Giant Bomb's Tamoor Hussain joins Greg to talk through all The Last of Us Part I details, Assassin's Creed rumors, and pro wrestling memories.   

Follow Tam: https://twitter.com/tamoorh

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:54 - Housekeeping

It’s the Xcast’s 100th episode today! Watch live on patreon.com/kindafunnygames or tomorrow on youtube.com/kindafunnygames! Major Nelson is swinging by!

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady, Gordon McGuire, & Al Tribesman

The Roper Report  -
00:08:30 - The Last of Us Part 1 Detailed, Kat Bailey @ IGN
00:24:20 - Guerrilla Games Is Shutting Down Online Servers For Killzone, RIGS, Demi Williams @ GameSpot
00:37:25 - Ad
00:39:20 - Assassin’s Creed Red
00:43:06 - Ubisoft Pushes Back Next Assassin’s Creed Title in Already Thin Year - Jason Schreier @ Bloomberg
00:53:20 - Nintendo Switch Sports Update Incoming
00:55:15 - Out today
00:56:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Tim
TUE: Janet and Gary
WED: Blessing and Janet
THURS: Blessing and Mike
FRI: Blessing and Tam
